TEXT.S: aicu a line mavan a matjaita a tada a apu (mobile application) a tja sipatigami a sipadinghua itua suci katua tingnaw. maqatitjen a sema line a papadjaljun tua sinivecik, sasing, qaqivuan tua zuma. manu izua pupaysuan nua line a pinapungadan a line pay (Line Pay). aicu a line a namasan tjaljamakeljang a apu i dripung, i tayuan, katua i tailend (Thailand).
